docs.snippet: Kerber, the newly crowned world No. 1, crushed Agnieszka Radwanska, the defending champion, by 6-2, 6-1 to advance to the final in the tour’s end-of-season championship in Singapore....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kerber, the newly crowned world No. 1, crushed Agnieszka Radwanska, the defending champion, by 6-2, 6-1 to advance to the final in the tour’s end-of-season championship in Singapore.

headline.main: Angelique Kerber Will Play for WTA Finals Title
headline.print_headline: Fernandez Had Alcohol and Cocaine in System

docs.snippet: Ben Simmons, the subject of “One & Done,” knew that he would enter the N.B.A. draft after one season at Louisiana State. So why pretend?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Simmons, the subject of “One & Done,” knew that he would enter the N.B.A. draft after one season at Louisiana State. So why pretend?
docs.abstract: Joe Nocera Sports Business column says documentary film One & Done, which chronicles single year of college Ben Simmons attended at Louisiana State while waiting to qualify for NBA, reveals absurdity of current system; proposes alternatives, such as paying college basketball players or having NBA switch focus of its Development League from winning to training.

headline.main: One-and-Done System Gets a Documentary. Call It a Farce.
headline.print_headline: One-and-Done System Gets a Documentary. Call It a Farce.

docs.snippet: New Zealand's competition regulator on Monday asked for more detail on Sky Network Television's plan to buy Vodafone PLC for NZ$1.3 billion (763.46 million pounds), citing concern it would dampen competition from rival broadband and mobile provide...
docs.lead_paragraph: New Zealand's competition regulator on Monday asked for more detail on Sky Network Television's plan to buy Vodafone PLC for NZ$1.3 billion (763.46 million pounds), citing concern it would dampen competition from rival broadband and mobile providers.

headline.main: New Zealand Regulator Raises Competition Concerns Around Sky-Vodafone Proposed Deal
